title: 求一个管理mod的软件-----标题很短--------
author: jyh

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
MyCraft Mod Manager
http://www.frustra.org/mycraft
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=153315

MyCraft is a brand new mod manager with some very useful features. Up until now, Minecraft modding has been a bit of a repetitive process. The modder must constantly update their mods, and the users must re-download the mods each time. This mod manager solves these problems.

没实际用过, 你参考看看...

replies.author: 哥。蛋疼
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 哥。蛋疼 于 2011-5-15 19:33 编辑 

目前没有这个软件~
